name: Just 5 minutes！nurturing game
description:
Everyone looking for a game to kill time!
released an interesting game
attention here！

Please let me grow the characters firmly with your tap.
But if you make the wrong choice, you'll end up with something terrible, so be careful...
It seems that this time you can train mainly cute girls, so try clicking it.

This game is recommended for such people.

・People who like cute anime and characters
・People who like fast-paced stories
・ People looking for games to kill time
·Leisure person


〜How to play〜
1Read question
2 Look at the illustrations and tap the one you think is correct!
3 Two types of resulting images! Try to complete both
Hey! It's easy! Anyone can do it, you too!


EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app
